attributes.action: To block a 2nd EU referendum, & to block a 2nd Scottish independence referendum.
attributes.additional_details: The will of the majority MUST be realised if we are to retain democracy in Britain, a right that our forefathers fought and died for to defend, and so we absolutely must not allow this to be taken away from us out of what amounts to fear and jealous rage.
attributes.background: The OUT camp won the right to lead the British Isles out of the European Union by winning the majority vote through democratic process, now both the REMAIN camp & the SNP are looking to take away this right by forcing through a 2nd EU Referendum & a 2nd Scottish independence referendum respectively.
